name: Elara Vance
title: Seeker of the Arcane

attacks.name: Quarterstaff
attacks.notes: Versatile (1d8 when used with two hands).

features.title: Spellcasting (Wizard)
features.desc: You can cast wizard spells you have prepared. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability.

features.title: Arcane Recovery
features.desc: Once per day when you finish a short rest, you can choose expended spell slots to recover. The spell slots can have a combined level that is equal to or less than half your wizard level (rounded up).

features.title: Darkvision
features.desc: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

features.title: Fey Ancestry
features.desc: You have advantage on saving throws against being Charmed, and magic can’t put you to sleep.

features.title: Trance
features.desc: You don’t need to sleep. Instead, you meditate deeply, remaining semiconscious, for 4 hours a day.

features.title: Magic Initiate (Wizard)
features.desc: You learn two cantrips and one 1st-level spell from the Wizard spell list. You can cast the 1st-level spell once per long rest without a spell slot.

features.title: Arcane Tradition
features.desc: You follow the School of Evocation, focusing your study on spells that create powerful elemental effects.

features.title: Evocation Savant
features.desc: The gold and time you must spend to copy an evocation spell into your spellbook is halved.

features.title: Sculpt Spells
features.desc: When you cast an evocation spell, you can create pockets of safety. Choose a number of creatures equal to 1 + the spell's level. The chosen creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws against the spell, and they take no damage if they would normally take half damage.

equipment: A quarterstaff, a spellbook, a scholar's pack, a component pouch, and a letter from a dead master.

personality.traits: I use polysyllabic words that convey the impression of great erudition. I am never without my spellbook.
personality.ideal: Knowledge. The path to power and self-improvement is through knowledge.
personality.bond: I work to preserve the ancient library of my mentor, which was thought to be lost.
personality.flaw: I am easily distracted by the promise of new information or a rare, forgotten text.

spells.name: Fire Bolt
spells.desc: Hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range.

spells.name: Light
spells.desc: Touch one object and cause it to glow with light.

spells.name: Mage Hand
spells.desc: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range.

spells.name: Prestidigitation
spells.desc: You create one of several minor magical effects.

spells.name: Ray of Frost
spells.desc: A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature.

spells.name: Mage Armor
spells.desc: Touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends. The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.desc: You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range.

spells.name: Shield
spells.desc: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC.

spells.name: Identify
spells.desc: You choose one object that you must touch. You learn its properties and whether it requires attunement.

spells.name: Misty Step
spells.desc: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

spells.name: Web
spells.desc: You conjure a mass of thick, sticky webbing at a point of your choice within range.
